thread.title_full: Harwood Feffer LLP Announces Investigation of Solera Holdings, Inc.

title: Harwood Feffer LLP Announces Investigation of Solera Holdings, Inc.
text: Harwood Feffer LLP Announces Investigation of Solera Holdings, Inc.   Harwood Feffer LLP Announces Investigation of Solera Holdings, Inc. -- NEW YORK  Harwood Feffer LLP. Harwood Feffer LLP. <-  <- stripped tags -> NEW YORK   Harwood Feffer LLP ([[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2RHRnlaMlYwUFNkZllteGhibXNuSUdoeVpXWTlYQ0pvZEhSd09pOHZkM2QzTG1obVpYTnhMbU52YlZ3aUlISmxiRDFjSW01dlptOXNiRzkzWENJK2QzZDNMbWhtWlhOeExtTnZiVHd2WVQ0PXw=]]) is investigating potential claims against the board of directors of Solera Holdings, Inc. ("Solera" or the "Company") (NYSE: [[]]) concerning the proposed acquisition of the Company by a group led by Vista Equity Partners ("Vista"). Under the terms of the offer, the Vista would acquire Solera in a transaction valued at approximately $6.5 billion . Pursuant to the deal, Solera stockholders would receive $55.85 in cash per share owned. The offer price represents a scant 12.9% premium based on the closing price of Solera stock on September 11, 2015 and Solera stock traded as high as $56.14 as recently as March 2015. Our investigation concerns whether the Solera board of directors is fulfilling its fiduciary duties, maximizing the value of the Company, disclosing all material benefits and costs, and obtaining full and fair consideration for Company stockholders. If you own Solera shares and wish to discuss this matter with us, or have any questions concerning your rights and interests with regard to this matter, please contact: Benjamin I Sachs-Michaels, Esq.
